appsmith.onReady(() => {});
appsmith.onModelChange(newModal => {
  const svg1 = `
		<svg class="selected" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 87 1042" preserveAspectRatio="none" fill="none">
			<path d="M1 1041V1L16.1286 172.912C26.8531 294.778 50.7818 422.299 85.9036 520.081C86.6117 522.052 86.6185 524.179 85.9229 526.155C50.8332 625.824 26.7222 752.721 15.7245 875.977L1 1041Z"
				fill="url(#paint0_linear)" stroke="url(#paint1_linear)" />
			<defs>
				<linearGradient id="paint0_linear" x1="91.35" y1="521" x2="1" y2="521" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
					<stop stop-color="#EEF4FF" />
					<stop offset="1" stop-color="#F9F9F9" />
				</linearGradient>
				<linearGradient id="paint1_linear" x1="87" y1="521" x2="1" y2="521" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
					<stop stop-color="#5D9AFF" />
					<stop offset="1" stop-color="#F9F9F9" />
				</linearGradient>
			</defs>
		</svg>
		`;
  const svg2 = `
		<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 86 1040"  preserveAspectRatio="none" fill="none">
			<path d="M0 1040V0L15.1286 171.912C25.8531 293.778 49.7818 421.299 84.9036 519.081C85.6117 521.052 85.6185 523.179 84.9229 525.155C49.8332 624.824 25.7222 751.721 14.7245 874.977L0 1040Z"
				fill="url(#paint0_linear)" />
			<defs>
				<linearGradient id="paint0_linear" x1="90.35" y1="520" x2="0" y2="520" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
					<stop stop-color="#AAAAAA" stop-opacity="0.15" />
					<stop offset="1" stop-color="#AEAEAE" stop-opacity="0" />
				</linearGradient>
			</defs>
		</svg>
		`;
  const isSelected = newModal.selected;
  const container = document.getElementById("svgContainer");
  container.style.height = "724px";
  container.innerHTML = isSelected ? svg1 : svg2;
});
